article_title: 'Vindictiveness' Behind Obama's 50 Cut in NYC Counterterror Funds

article_metadata.news_keywords: ray, kelly, schumer, cut, terror, funds, new york city

og.description: Former New York City Police Commissioner Ray Kelly is accusing the Obama administration of slashing the city's counterterrorism funding 50 percent in retaliation for Sen. Chuck Schumer not backing the White House's Iran deal.
